name: Stick Battle
description:
This is an action-packed 2-player game! You play as a stickman, and your goal is to defeat the other stickman. 

CREDIT: This, this, and this.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Due to several cross-platform related issues, I was not able to make this for MacOS. Mac users, please enjoy playing this in the browser for now. However, I do plan on updating the game into a more Mac-Friendly environment, so MacOS users can enjoy this game.
